meanings.definition: A group or organization that is part of a larger organization.
meanings.sent1: The suborganizations within the company handle specific tasks.
meanings.sent2: The suborganizations report to the main headquarters.
meanings.sent3: The suborganizations decided to have a pizza party on Fridays.
meanings.sent4: The suborganizations are like puzzle pieces fitting into the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: The suborganizations operate independently but contribute to the overall success.

meanings.definition: The act of organizing into smaller groups within a larger organization.
meanings.sent1: Effective suborganizations can improve efficiency within a company.
meanings.sent2: The suborganizations of the event planning team work seamlessly together.
meanings.sent3: During the team-building exercise, they practiced suborganizations by splitting into groups.
meanings.sent4: The concept of suborganizations is like dividing a big cake into smaller slices.
meanings.sent5: Understanding suborganizations is key to streamlining processes in a business.
